name: Report Object Instance File
summary: Learn about .ROI files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Actuate software was prominent in the late 1990s and 2000s as a business intelligence (BI), enterprise reporting, and data analytics tool. Before being discontinued, large finance, healthcare, and government organizations commonly used Actuate software to generate interactive reports from various data sources, including databases, spreadsheets, and real-time business systems.

instructions: You can open ROI files with Actuate software, including Actuate Information Object Designer. However, Actuate software is no longer developed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
